short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenshot the page and display it in a browser-like container

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot of the current page with a simple click and display it inside a browser-like frame, this app allow you to customize the background and the size of the the final screenshot to display it wherever you want.
